Theme Description

The Aston Martin Windows 7 Theme consists of 30+ Hi-Res Wallpapers, custom Aston Martin icons and genuine Aston Martin car sounds. The Aston Martin fans would enjoy this theme.

Aston Martin Lagonda Limited is a British manufacturer of luxury sports cars, based in Gaydon, Warwickshire. The company name is derived from the name of one of the company?s founders, Lionel Martin, and from the Aston Hill speed hillclimb near Aston Clinton in Buckinghamshire.

Trivia:

    * Aston Martin is also known as the Bond car, since that is the car that appears in all the James Bond movies.
    * The Aston Martin DB5 went into production in 1963 and is the most famous Aston Martin car due to its use by James Bond in ?Goldfinger? (1964)
    * The fastest road car in the history of Aston Martin is the car that fuses hand-crafted tradition with the highest calibre of automotive technology ? The ?Vanquish S? is the ultimate Aston Martin
    * Steven Gerrard, Frank Lampard, Ashley Cole all have one thing in common ? except that they are football stars ? they own a Aston Martin.
    *Other famous owners include Steven Spielberg, Jennifer Lopez, Ben Affleck, Janet Jackson, Morrissey, David Beckham and Nicolas Cage to name a few!
